sys_update_xml.name: kb_knowledge_0a3245f31bd03d509a872f41f54bcb68
sys_update_xml.payload:
truetext9ecb0fe41beb99509a872f41f54bcb63falsefalsefalsefalsefalse0556a696d1b5c7150edce10ad9c4bcbae7a2cec7aaf91f01064bb30330e274939Types of SLAs There are 2 SLAs for incidents. The first one is called the "Response" SLA. This determinesKB00102562023-08-03Incident SLAs and Scheduleskb_knowledgelerwinesa2023-08-03 15:20:52global/0a3245f31bd03d509a872f41f54bcb684lerwinesa2023-08-03 15:55:080Types of SLAs

There are 2 SLAs for incidents. The first one is called the "Response" SLA. This determines how soon an incident must be assigned to a person or another group for resolution. The second SLA is for the actual incident resolution.

Incident Activity Flow

  1. Incident is submitted.
    • It is assigned to Secure Service Desk.
    • Clock starts for the incident response SLA.
    • SLA clock is paused while the incident is put on hold and the "On Hold Reason" is set to "Waiting on caller", but only for those with Moderate or Low priorities. The SLA clock for response is never paused for Critical and High priority incidents.
  2. Incident is assigned to a user or to another group.
    • Clock for the incident response SLA is stopped.
    • Clock starts for the incident resolution SLA.
    • SLA clock is paused while the incident is put on hold, regardless of the Priority level or the value of the "On Hold Reason" field.
  3. Incident is resolved or cancelled.
    • Clock for the incident response SLA is stopped.

Incident response and resolution time matrix

This is a table of the SLA response times and applied schedules, according to the incident's priority value and the "VIP" for the caller.

PriorityVIPResponse SLAResolution SLA
TimeScheduleTimeSchedule
CriticalYes15 MinutesFacility Hours (6AM-6PM)1 HourNormal Workday Hours (8AM-5PM)
CriticalNo15 MinutesFacility Hours (6AM-6PM)2 HoursNormal Workday Hours (8AM-5PM)
HighYes1 HourFacility Hours (6AM-6PM)4 HoursNormal Workday Hours (8AM-5PM)
HighNo2 HoursFacility Hours (6AM-6PM)8 HoursNormal Workday Hours (8AM-5PM)
ModerateYes4 HoursNormal Workday Hours (8AM-5PM)8 HoursNormal Workday Hours (8AM-5PM)
ModerateNo8 HoursNormal Workday Hours (8AM-5PM)2 DaysCore Hours (9AM-3PM)
Low✝Yes8 HoursNormal Workday Hours (8AM-5PM)2 DaysCore Hours (9AM-3PM)
Low✝No2 DaysCore Hours (9AM-3PM)4 DaysCore Hours (9AM-3PM)

✝ Incidents with a priority value of "Planning" have the same SLA definitions as those with "Low" priority values.

Defined Schedules

  • Facility Hours: Weekdays from 6AM until 6PM, excluding holidays.
  • Normal Workday Hours: Weekdays from 8AM until 5PM, excluding holidays.
  • Core Hours: Weekdays from 9AM until 3PM, excluding holidays.

Incident Priority Calculation

The priority value for incidents is calculated from the selected Impact and Urgency values as follows:

1 - High1 - High1 - Critical
1 - High2 - Medium2 - High
2 - Medium1 - High2 - High
1 - High3 - Low3 - Moderate
2 - Medium2 - Medium3 - Moderate
3 - Low1 - High3 - Moderate
2 - Medium3 - Low4 - Low
3 - Low2 - Medium4 - Low
3 - Low3 - Low5 - Planning
]]>General02100-01-01truepublished
